name: European Liaison Committee for Agriculture and agri-food trade
goal:
CELCAA is the European Umbrella representing the profession of trade in agri-commodities and agri-food products to the EU institutions, stakeholders and media.
CELCAA acts as a platform of exchange between its members, and has the role to educate the EU decision-makers about the role of the trade in the economy.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Consumer Affairs, Customs, Enterprise, Food Safety, Internal Market, Public Health, Research and Technology, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives: CELCAA is following free trade negotiations, in particular the EU - USA TTIP, implementation of EU - Canada CETA agreement, EU-Japan , EU-Mercosur etc. CELCAA is also following all regulatory development covering food, such as official controls; Food Information for Consumers. In addition, CELCAA is interested in Customs matters and transport and logistics issues.
